analysis.description:
FindBitToken.freeze (/unique_chucks/22/0x0079a404c09ddd8950cd3dab6244f0c1bd96e126.sol#236-255) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(_value > 0 && _value <= balances[msg.sender]) (/unique_chucks/22/0x0079a404c09ddd8950cd3dab6244f0c1bd96e126.sol#237-238)

FindBitToken.freezeFrom (/unique_chucks/22/0x0079a404c09ddd8950cd3dab6244f0c1bd96e126.sol#255-279) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(_value > 0 && _value <= balances[_who]) (/unique_chucks/22/0x0079a404c09ddd8950cd3dab6244f0c1bd96e126.sol#259-260)

FindBitToken.unfreeze (/unique_chucks/22/0x0079a404c09ddd8950cd3dab6244f0c1bd96e126.sol#279-309) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(schedule.lastReleased.add(60) < timestamp) (/unique_chucks/22/0x0079a404c09ddd8950cd3dab6244f0c1bd96e126.sol#286)
	- require(bool)(schedule.amount > 0 && timestamp > schedule.cliff) (/unique_chucks/22/0x0079a404c09ddd8950cd3dab6244f0c1bd96e126.sol#286)
	- timestamp >= schedule.start.add(schedule.duration) (/unique_chucks/22/0x0079a404c09ddd8950cd3dab6244f0c1bd96e126.sol#288-296)
	- require(bool)(unreleased > 0) (/unique_chucks/22/0x0079a404c09ddd8950cd3dab6244f0c1bd96e126.sol#296-298)

FindBitToken.burn (/unique_chucks/22/0x0079a404c09ddd8950cd3dab6244f0c1bd96e126.sol#321-326) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(_value > 0 && _value <= balances[_who]) (/unique_chucks/22/0x0079a404c09ddd8950cd3dab6244f0c1bd96e126.sol)
